# PED::SET_DRIVER_AGGRESSIVENESS

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** driverAggressiveness

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set's a driver's aggressiveness value, mostly used to determine
how fast they want to drive

range 0.0f - 1.0f
